column4: mahatm: I don't know for sure, but when I had an old brother printer, it would emulate an HP.  You might try using a standard HP driver and see what happens...
so, does anyone know why my shutdown menu doesn't have the shutdown command as an option (or restart for that matter)...  or where I might find that config?
as far as I know, gnome.  (ubuntu Dapper Dan, what it came with)
